name: ModernFlamesSunsetSeries
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn off the light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This application acts as a remote for all Modern Flames Sunset Series logsets. Modern Flames Sunset Series logset and Modern Flames app required for use. Please see the user manual for your Modern Flames Sunset Series logset for detailed setup instructions.
